S.FORM: æuma tyn. Ka kytt'ei ni-mad tyni-æn ki dimmi-dimmi-en ka malaliko tou'æpag-hin.
2 Heirou ka katytt'en ti Jesus ta tnamfing-an nein, ni-k'ma ki dimmi-dimmi-en-da, Pæh-shut-â æpak, atta-ral-en-kow ki varau.
3 Ka k'ytt'ei ta rarouma ki Makou-sasoulat ni-mattai-rarÿhda, Barigh mahkou-talum ta ti atta [ki Alid.]
4 Ka dou kmytta ta ti Jesus ki na pæh-darimdini nein, ni-k'ma, Ka oumang pah-fammuk-kamou pæh-dimdim tou rÿh-oumi?
5 Ka mang ta masaoun assi mahougfpit ka sou, Atta-ral-en kow ki varau; ki pou-sou-en lava, 'Æhpit-â, mou-naunang-â?

6 Ka alei ka moumha-ah-ka-mou, ka akou-keirang-en ki kailh-en ta Alak ki kaeuloung tou atta-ral-han ki varau tou Næi-râ (nda ni-k'ma tou dimmi-dimmi-en) Æhpittâ, arau ta æpag-in-oho, d'marang-â mouqua tou tallagh-oho.
7 Ka rou ni-æhpit, ni-dmarang mouqua tou tallagh tyn.
8 Irou ka kakytt'an [ta atta] ki Makoilalaulau, ni-mou rynghau ka ni-paka-irang ki kidi ki Alid, ka ni-piha ki keirang-en ki kailh-hen ka k'ma-hynna ki kaeuloung-da.
